trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Alvin
There were no other sightings in Alvin on or around January 22nd 2009
Summary: Triangular shaped lighted all over . No blinking or strobe lights. Flew noiseless. It was traveling as fast a small plane. From Alvin,TX towards Houston TX.
divs: Sighting DetailsAT APPROX 7:20 while I was outside a parking lot after work, I saw coming from the EAST horizon heading WEST, a lighted triangular shaped object that resembled a kite or a bird with it's wings wide open. However, the object was outlined with low dim yellowish lights that defined its shape and direction of travel. It was noiseless and flew with some sort of intelligent control. It kept same speed until it got out of sight. I called the HOUSTON CHRONICLE news desk as well as CH 11 HOUSTON news room and gave a detailed description of my sighting in case someone else would call it in. I was unable to take any photo of video, it caught me unprepared.
